name: WATERMILL - A PEACEFUL PROJECT
description:
This isn't much, not very fancy. 90% of all models are made by my bro, but the coding and stuff is all me. A Watermill in a large grass plane.

Coming Soon: Info Bubbles

INFO BUTTONS ADDED!

Current Bugs: Type is broken when pressing button before typing has finished

Controls: 

Left Click to Pick Up, Right to release

5 and 6 to switch items

1 and 2 to switch views

Escape to menu

See what happens to crates :D
